19.06.2014 GB SCR18974 BID700A/Debtor is marked with URS markcode: Chnaged condition for start this test

set PO.ACTION = 1 to If PO.ACTION = 3 and GSBU_YESNO (2090) = Y and there is a row in DUNNING_HISTORY for this debtor where
GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE - DUNH_DATE < GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS (2090) then set PO.ACTION = 1,
added Special BE tests and changed stert condition for An invoice is marked as 'Dispute' and Existence of specially booked
invoices (i.e. payment difference, partial payment)

only if debtor has delaing and positive ballance

07-12-2005 AK SCR 9717 Whenever CLNT301_ALLINCHAIN = 'Y' , set PO.ACTION = 1
-- Variables used to determine the country code to obtain CCDU
check dunning history - if debtor received a letter in the last 10 days then
sent automatic is overruled and advice will be send to the chain
Whenever CCRY302_ALLINCHAIN = 'Y' , set PO.ACTION = 1
-- If PO.ACTION = 3 and GSBU_YESNO (2090) = Y and there is a row in DUNNING_HISTORY for this debtor where
-- GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE - DUNH_DATE < GSBU_NUMBEROFDAYS (2090) then set PO.ACTION = 1
-- Only if PO.ACTION = 3 (can be handled immediately) and (PO.ACTIONDEBTORADV = TEL or TEC
-- or PO.ACTIONCLIENTADV = TEL or TEC or PO.ACTIONOTHERADV = TEL or TEC) then set PO.ACTION = 1
if PO.ACTION = 0 set also PO.CATEGORY =0
(only for the good order, no functional efect)
-- Determine the country code for further selection in the program
-- Check if DEBTOR is a 'draft paying customer'
... if True, then check if row exists in CCDU for current client where
CCDU302_COUNTRY = 'WW'
-- Check if DEBTOR is a 'Franch speaking belgium'
... if True, then check if row exists in CCDU for current client where
CCDU302_COUNTRY = 'YY'
-- Set v.CLIENT_COUNTRY_DUNNING
-- Fetch CCRY302_ALLINCHAIN/CCRY302_CONTINUOUS
Only debtors with outstanding invoices need to be selected
call BID704 for oldest invoice information
Only debtors with outstanding invoices need to be selected
If GSBU_YESNO (2095) = N and (DEBC_DUNNINGSTOP = Y or DEBC_CLIENTDUNNINGCODE = 2)
Outstanding balance < 0
call task chk outstanding invoices in order to update all necesary parameters
for the next 5 checks
Debtor is marked with URS markcode
Member of buying group / Super Store
Heller not authorised to dun the debtor
debtor has no posetive ballance - no action
Debtor marked for automatic collection
Debtor is marked as 'Special debtor'
v.READY set to 'N' (debtor continue for client advice in BID700B
Negative payment difference and no other overdue invoices
Debtor is marked as 'Risc debtor' and has delaying
v.READY set to 'N' (debtor continue for client advice in BID700B
All outstanding invoices are payment differences
Existence of specially booked invoices (i.e.payment difference, partial payment)
the value of the category (6 or 7 ) is determend in task
"chk outstanding invoices"
will go further to BID700B (v.READY='N')
An invoice is marked as 'Dispute'
will go further to BID700B (v.READY='N')
Outstanding balance is too small and there is no credit limit present
Delaying payment pattern
-- If PO.CATEGORY between 6 and 8 and DEBC_CLIENTDUNNINGCODE = 1 then
-- PO.CATEGORY = 17
Special BE tests
-- No chain generation if debtor has MC 37
-- No chain generation if debtor is already in agenda

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT INVO_NO, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVO_MARKCODETEXT, INVO_CODDRAFT, INVO_PAYMENTCODE, INVO_CODINTERESTINVOICE, INVO_CODPAYMENTDIFF, INVO_MARKCODESPECDATE, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_AACTUALH
FROM :1/INVO
WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI<>0
for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: In the end of the process v.InvoicesMarkcode will contain the smallest
Markcode value
######### specially booked invoice ########## (begin)
General - category = 7
Ageing drafts (FR or DT)
Drafts whom are not belong to countries FR or DT
payment code
######### specially booked invoice ########## (end)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT INVO_NO, INVO_MARKCODESPEC,INVO_MARKCODETEXT, INVO_CODDRAFT, INVO_PAYMENTCODE, INVO_CODINTERESTINVOICE, INVO_CODPAYMENTDIFF, INVO_MARKCODESPECDATE FROM :1/INVO WHERE INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI>0 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: In the end of the process v.InvoicesMarkcode will contain the smallest
Markcode value
specially booked invoice

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(sum(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTINVDATE) / sum(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNT-DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTDISPUTES-DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTPARTIALPAYM) as decimal(3,0)) FROM :1/DCMO WHERE DCMO_DEBC_NO =:2 and DCMO_CURRENCY=':3' and (DCMO_YEAR*100+DCMO_MONTH) between :4 and :5 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: if v.CALCDAYS is negative or =0 (not due)
Continue only if number of days before doe date of the oldest invoice is bigger
then 21 (for FR debtor 112 days) otherwise no action - no advice
update advice 1/2/3 only if it still empty
if advice is empty (no match was found not in DCDU and not in CCDU)
check for existent of future advice in DCDU or CCDU
call BID700C to define the category, if it is not already Determined in BID700A
if advice was found in DCDU or in CCDU
only if there is also past advice then write debtor in the advice chain
if CLNT301_ALLINCHAIN = 'Y' even debtors without advice should be included
Special BE tests
-- No chain generation if debtor has MC 37
No chain generation if debtor is already in agenda

Header.Description: Get advice from DCDU or CCDU

Text.val: this program checks if the dunning advice will be based on debtor level
, on client/contry level or no advice
use DCDU advice ?
v.SENDAUTOM get his value from the first line that is found
right now all advice from one periode get all the same value in
DCDU302_SENTAUTOM - in the future it will change
v.SENDAUTOM get his value from the first line that is found
right now all advice from one periode get all the same value in
CCDU302_SENTAUTOM - in the future it will change
no Advice was found (do nothing for now)

FormName.valUnicode: run on DCDU to get advice
run on DCDU to get advice

Header.Description: chk future advice DCDU or CCDU

Text.val: this program checks if there are dunning advice in future compering to the aging
of the oldest invoce - search in both levels - on debtor level or client/contry level
-- DCDU future
-- CCDU future
-- DCDU past
-- CCDU past
-- check always the existence of before due day advice (v.VARCODE(before/after due day=2)
-- CCDU past
-- check always the existence of AFTER due day advice (v.VARCODE(before/after due day=1)
-- CCDU future
If DEBC_CLIENTDUNNINGCODE = 1 then set PO.CATEGORY = 17
If DEBC_CLIENTLIMITCODE = 'D' or 'E' and date of (most recent) entry of this
code is more recent than invoice date of oldest invoice:
check for most recent entry of DEBC_CLIENTLIMITCOD in DB_HISTORY
If specific Risc information has been produced:
for preformence reason preform all chceks on TDIV in one program
If there is an invoice due more than 71 days and the credit limit > 0
If there is an invoice due between 0 and 71 days and the credit limit > 0
If total AGEING =98+ and no creditlimit for this debtor
If total amount < EUR 250
If there is an invoice due more than 71 days
If there is an invoice due between 43 and 71 days with an sum amount of EUR>500
All other situations

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT max(DBHS_VALIDATION_DATE) FROM :1/DBHS WHERE DBHS_TAB_PREFIX='DEBC' and DBHS_FIELD_NAME='DEBC_CLIENTLIMITCODE' and DBHS_VALUE_NEW=':2' and DBHS_KEY=':3' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: check for most recent entry of DEBC_CLIENTLIMITCOD in DB_HISTORY

Header.Description: chk TDIV and fill invo param

Text.val: TDIV_CALLPROG range on BID704 only if pi.callProg is empty

FormName.valUnicode: chk TDIV and fill invo param
